About.Desc: Hi! I'm a software engineer currently operating from Sweden. I have made this page to combine an introduction of me as a person with a summary of my skillset and to present some of my previous work. Find out more below.

Infospread.Title: Infospread Euro AB
Infospread.Desc: I worked for Infospread during the last year of my engineering studies, this partnership led to several developed software products in different fields of software and IT.

JU.Title: Jönköping University
JU.Desc: After studying about 3 years i graduated 2020 from Jönköping University, i wrote my thesis work in collaboration with Infospread and it's about predicting patterns in the statistics of commuting. My grades and the thesis work can be found below.

Skills.Desc: I have been coding in different languages depending on the requirements of the task. I would say the languages and frameworks i feel most at home with are: Java (Android Studio), Javascript (Node.js & React), Python 3.5, Obj-C or Swift (X-Code)

Portfolio.Desc: When i'm not in the kitchen cooking food to music, i sometimes spend my spare time coding. Some of the results of this activity can be found below.
